You and your friend are on the search for treasure! You both come across a cave. What happens next will surprise you!

I worked really, really hard on this game! I invite everyone who doesn't mind vore to play this game!
Suggested rating 18+.

Game link here. http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/myolrlpcf0cv6hd6flveya/adventure-vore-game
